plugins.name: Content Kit
plugins.description: his Figma plugin allows designers to quickly generate Nigerian-themed content directly within their projects, saving time and enhancing local relevance. The plugin includes customizable templates, authentic text content (e.g., Yoruba proverbs, Pidgin phrases, or local idioms), cultural icons, and elements inspired by Nigeria’s rich diversity. Whether designing for digital products, branding, or social media, the plugin ensures an authentic touch, fostering deeper connections with Nigerian audiences. Users can tweak settings to suit various languages, regions, and styles, making it a versatile tool for creative professionals.
plugins.tagline: Generate Nigerian names and more!

Users can tweak settings to suit various languages, regions, and styles, making it a versatile tool for creative professionals.

plugins.name: Structura Swagger Annotator
plugins.description:
Description

Structura revolutionizes how you manage API, design, and copy documentation. With an all-in-one platform, gain clarity on workflows, discover the exact APIs and components used, and ensure precise copies across your designs.


How To?

  1. Run this plugin into your figma files
  2. Paste the whole swagger documentation
  3. Select one of the component and map it by filling the correct path and method
  4. To update the swagger just reupload again the whole json swagger


Feature Request?

Feel free to request more features, for this plugin. Next roadmap for this plugin will be:

  1. Code generation for API request
  2. Hands On API Request on Plugin
  3. Copywriter integration(such as integrating with lokalise)
plugins.tagline: Simplify API and Design documentation by annotating component with swagger API docs.

113888.name: Structura Swagger Annotator
113888.description:

How To?

  2. Paste the whole swagger documentation
  3. Select one of the component and map it by filling the correct path and method
  4. To update the swagger just reupload again the whole json swagger


Feature Request?

Feel free to request more features, for this plugin. Next roadmap for this plugin will be:

  1. Code generation for API request
  2. Hands On API Request on Plugin
  3. Copywriter integration(such as integrating with lokalise)
113888.tagline: Simplify API and Design documentation by annotating component with swagger API docs.

plugins.name: Pancake Work
plugins.description:
Guideline (Vietnamese):

  1. Plugin giúp link figma design vào một issue của Pancake Work
  2. Các bước thực hiện:


  1. Vào Pancake Work copy link issue
  2. Chọn node cần gắn link, chú ý đánh dấu ready for dev cho node đó trước (nếu cần) (node nên là frame/section)
  3. Mở plugin Pancake Work, paste link issue vào ô đầu tiên (Plugin có lưu lại link với mỗi node)
  4. Click vào ô thứ 2, nhấn Cmd + L (với Mac), hoặc Ctrl + L (với Windows) để lấy link figma, rồi paste
  5. Nhấn Create/Update


Roadmap:

  1. Update English guideline
  2. Listen feedback from Pancake designers to improve
  3. Maybe link for Kanban
  4. Hmmm, I don't know...


Copyright 2024 Pancake
plugins.tagline: Link Figma designs to Pancake Work

130564.name: Pancake Work
130564.description:
Guideline (Vietnamese):

  1. Plugin giúp link figma design vào một issue của Pancake Work
  2. Các bước thực hiện:


  1. Vào Pancake Work copy link issue
  2. Chọn node cần gắn link, chú ý đánh dấu ready for dev cho node đó trước (nếu cần) (node nên là frame/section)
  3. Mở plugin Pancake Work, paste link issue vào ô đầu tiên (Plugin có lưu lại link với mỗi node)
  4. Click vào ô thứ 2, nhấn Cmd + L (với Mac), hoặc Ctrl + L (với Windows) để lấy link figma, rồi paste
  5. Nhấn Create/Update


Roadmap:

  1. Update English guideline
  2. Listen feedback from Pancake designers to improve
  3. Maybe link for Kanban
  4. Hmmm, I don't know...


Copyright 2024 Pancake

networkAccess.reasoning: We need to access the Pancake Work api, Google Fonts

130564.tagline: Link Figma designs to Pancake Work

plugins.name: Toggle Visibility By Type
plugins.description:
Toggle Visibility by Type is designed to streamline your design workflow by allowing you to quickly toggle the visibility of selected layers based on their type.

Whether you’re working with 🖼️ images, 📝 text, 🔲 shapes, 🔗 paths, ↔️ lines, 📁 groups, or 📐 frames, this plugin provides an intuitive interface to control which elements are visible in your design. Simply select the layers or groups you want to modify, choose the layer type you want to toggle, and hit the ☑️ button.


This plugin is especially useful for managing complex designs and improving your efficiency in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Quickly toggle visibility of selected layers by type!

99518.name: Toggle Visibility By Type
99518.description:
Toggle Visibility by Type is designed to streamline your design workflow by allowing you to quickly toggle the visibility of selected layers based on their type.

Whether you’re working with 🖼️ images, 📝 text, 🔲 shapes, 🔗 paths, ↔️ lines, 📁 groups, or 📐 frames, this plugin provides an intuitive interface to control which elements are visible in your design. Simply select the layers or groups you want to modify, choose the layer type you want to toggle, and hit the ☑️ button.


This plugin is especially useful for managing complex designs and improving your efficiency in Figma.
99518.tagline: Quickly toggle visibility of selected layers by type!

plugins.name: ex-portable
plugins.description:
Ex-portable is a super simple plug-in for Figma that allows you to pull export settings from a main component in a library to an instance. That’s all.


Get settings for selected instances

Select the instances you want to apply the export settings from a main component in a library for, and select this command.


Get settings for all instances

Got a lot of instances on your page? Select this command to apply export settings from their main components.
plugins.tagline: Port your export settings from component to instance.

97644.name: ex-portable
97644.description:
Ex-portable is a super simple plug-in for Figma that allows you to pull export settings from a main component in a library to an instance. That’s all.


Get settings for selected instances

Select the instances you want to apply the export settings from a main component in a library for, and select this command.


Get settings for all instances

Got a lot of instances on your page? Select this command to apply export settings from their main components.
97644.tagline: Port your export settings from component to instance.

plugins.tagline: Translate

plugins.name: Easily Name output
plugins.description:
Step 1: Export Name Mapping


Prefix the node name with "▼". For example: "▼page-template".

Enter the Google Sheet URL in the first input field or click the file button to select a file.

The number of nodes must match the number of rows in the uploaded document (excluding the title).

The name mapping should be in the first column, with the column header named "Name".

Specify the corresponding sheet name.

If an XLSX file is selected, the first sheet will be prefilled.

Step 2: Export


Select the nodes to be exported.

If none are selected, all nodes on the current page starting with "▼" will be exported.

Choose the export format (PDF/PNG/JPG/SVG).
plugins.tagline: Replace Export Names for Figma Frame Types

92594.name: Easily Name output
92594.description:

The number of nodes must match the number of rows in the uploaded document (excluding the title).

The name mapping should be in the first column, with the column header named "Name".

Specify the corresponding sheet name.

If an XLSX file is selected, the first sheet will be prefilled.

Step 2: Export


Select the nodes to be exported.

If none are selected, all nodes on the current page starting with "▼" will be exported.

Choose the export format (PDF/PNG/JPG/SVG).
92594.tagline: Replace Export Names for Figma Frame Types

plugins.name: Varcator - Figma Variable Usage Finder
plugins.description:
Varcator - Figma Variable Usage Finder For Dev Mode


Varcator is a Figma plugin that helps you find where text variables are being used in your design files. It provides an efficient way to scan and track variable usage across your Figma projects.


🔥 Highly Recommend to select one variable at a time. 🔥


Features


  1. Variable Collection Scanning: Scan all text variables in your Figma file
  2. Selective Scanning: Choose which variables to scan for usage
  3. Usage Tracking: Find where each variable is being used
  4. Interactive UI: Click on usages to navigate to the specific layers
  5. Efficient Processing: Optimized scanning with rate limiting to prevent API throttling
  6. User-Friendly Interface: Clean and intuitive design for easy variable management
plugins.tagline: Figma Variable Usage Finder for Dev Mode

133934.name: Varcator - Figma Variable Usage Finder
133934.description:
Varcator - Figma Variable Usage Finder For Dev Mode


Varcator is a Figma plugin that helps you find where text variables are being used in your design files. It provides an efficient way to scan and track variable usage across your Figma projects.


🔥 Highly Recommend to select one variable at a time. 🔥


Features


  1. Variable Collection Scanning: Scan all text variables in your Figma file
  2. Selective Scanning: Choose which variables to scan for usage
  3. Usage Tracking: Find where each variable is being used
  4. Interactive UI: Click on usages to navigate to the specific layers
  5. Efficient Processing: Optimized scanning with rate limiting to prevent API throttling
  6. User-Friendly Interface: Clean and intuitive design for easy variable management
133934.tagline: Figma Variable Usage Finder for Dev Mode

plugins.name: Fillio - Elevate design with dynamic content
plugins.description:
Fillio - Less Typing, More Designing


Fillio is the simplest way to populate your Figma designs with realistic {{placeholder}} content. Whether you’re working on wireframes, prototypes, invoices, brand books, or daily UI design, Fillio saves you time by instantly filling your artboards with dynamic content.



Key Features:


Quick & Easy Filling:

Fill your designs with placeholders like names, addresses, and all type of contents in a single click.


Customizable Placeholders:

Use simple tags like {{name}} or {{Date}} to create dynamic content that fits your design.


Efficient Workflow:

Skip the tedious task of manually adding content—let Fillio do the heavy lifting.


Perfect for Prototypes & Wireframes:

Make your designs look polished even in early stages, without all the manual effort.



How it Works:


  1. Install Fillio from the Figma Community.
  2. Select the elements or frames where you want to add placeholders.
  3. Define Your Placeholders using simple tags like {{name}} or {{Type}}.
  4. Click “Submit”, and Fillio automatically adds content to your design.



Get Started with Fillio Today!

accepted.name: Mohammed M.Akasha
accepted.description: A User-centered Designer who crafts meaningful products through design.

plugins.tagline: Less Filling.. More designing.

plugins.name: Psi Figma Plugin
plugins.description:
Eliminate the hassle of searching for brand assets with the "Psi Figma Plugin". Instantly access Property Shop Investment LLC’s logos, colors, fonts, and more to streamline your design workflow.


Stay consistent and on-brand effortlessly with the "Psi Figma Plugin", crafted to centralize all your assets in one convenient place.


Key Features of the “ Psi Figma Plugin” :


  1. Import Property Shop Investment LLC’s brand assets directly into Figma.


  1. Access the latest logos, icons, colors, fonts, and design essentials with ease.


  1. Sync your Property Shop Investment LLC brand assets for fast and centralized access.



About Psi Figma Plugin :


The "Psi Figma Plugin" is the ultimate tool for managing Property Shop Investment LLC’s brand assets. It ensures Our brand stays consistent and accessible, empowering Our designs with the most up-to-date materials directly within Figma.


Have Questions or Feedback? Contact us at a.jarwan@psinv.net

accepted.name: Alaa Jarwan

plugins.name: Hive
plugins.description:
Tired of endless swiping, cluttered frames, and struggling to stay focused?

Say hello to Hive, the ultimate Figma plugin designed to transform your design process. With its minimalist approach and powerful features, Hive ensures a smoother, more organized, and efficient workflow for designers and teams alike. Perfect for those working on complex projects with multiple screens and teams presenting designs or collaborating on organized workspaces.


Key Features

🗂 Create Categories: Group frames into organized categories for a streamlined workflow.

🔍 Zoom-In Functionality: Quickly focus on specific categories, making navigation seamless.

🎯 Smooth Screen Presentation: Eliminate the frustration of moving around messy frames while presenting. Hive ensures a clean, irritation-free presentation experience.

⚡ Simplified Workflow: Minimalist, easy-to-use interface that saves time and effort.

🔄 Quick Frame Switching: Easily switch between frames without excessive swiping, allowing for a faster and more efficient workflow as you move through different tasks.


Why This Plugin?

When working on large design files, scrolling endlessly, searching for frames, or jumping between screens during team presentations can be chaotic and jarring to the eye. Hive eliminates the frustration by organizing frames into clear categories and enabling zoom-in functionality. Whether you're working alone or presenting designs to your team, Hive keeps your workspace smooth, clean, and irritation-free.

🚀 Boost Productivity: Spend less time navigating and more time designing.

🗂️ Stay Organized: Keep your navigation intuitive without modifying your file structure.

🎯 Improve Focus: Streamline your workflow to maintain momentum on your creative projects.

🤝 Enhance Collaboration: Share organized and easy-to-navigate files with your team, fostering better teamwork and understanding.

⏳ Save Time: Glide’s intuitive features reduce the time spent on repetitive tasks, giving you more room for creativity.


Ready to Hive? Try it out now and watch your productivity soar. Let your designs flow effortlessly. Organize, focus, and present without distractions.
plugins.tagline: Hive: Organise. Categorise. Focus.

plugins.name: skinnerplugin
plugins.description:
Bring your CSS themes to life effortlessly with Skinner. This plugin empowers designers to create, manage, and apply consistent styles across all elements of their Figma projects with ease. By simply providing a CSS theme, Skinner instantly generates paint styles for backgrounds, text, and accents, enabling a streamlined and cohesive design workflow.


With Skinner, you can:


Generate and update styles in seconds.

Maintain a consistent design aesthetic across your projects.

Easily switch between different color themes and accents for versatile design needs.

Whether you’re designing for web, mobile, or any digital interface, Skinner ensures that your styles are always organized, professional, and ready for use.


Simplify. Style. Create. With Skinner.
plugins.tagline: Skinner - Seamless Style Generation for Figma

plugins.name: RTS CopyBookCreator
plugins.description:
The plugin pulls all texts from selected frames and creates a CSV-file. The CSV will have 4 columns to help you organize your copybook. These columns are: Name of the Frame, Name of the Group, Name of the Text-Style, Text. If you organize your designs accordingly, you'll get a neatly structured Copybook.


Important: The plugin uses semicolons as delimiter, so that Excel can show the CSV properly.
plugins.tagline: Pulls all texts from your figma designs and creates a csv file.

107835.name: RTS CopyBookCreator
107835.description:
The plugin pulls all texts from selected frames and creates a CSV-file. The CSV will have 4 columns to help you organize your copybook. These columns are: Name of the Frame, Name of the Group, Name of the Text-Style, Text. If you organize your designs accordingly, you'll get a neatly structured Copybook.


Important: The plugin uses semicolons as delimiter, so that Excel can show the CSV properly.
107835.tagline: Pulls all texts from your figma designs and creates a csv file.

plugins.name: Zero Me
plugins.description:
Zero Me: Center Your Starting Point


Start designing from anywhere on the canvas, and when you're ready, let Zero Me center your creations. Simply select your frames and objects, run the plugin, and Zero Me will position your designs at coordinates (0, 0), keeping your canvas clean and organized.


Zero Me is a small but mighty Figma plugin that simplifies the process of centering and aligning your designs. It's for designers who want to maintain a tidy workspace and ensure a consistent starting point for their projects.


Key Features:

1. Center Alignment: Zero Me sets the position of your selected frames and objects to coordinates (0, 0), providing a centered starting point for your designs.

2. Multiple Object Support: Select multiple frames and objects, and Zero Me will align them all to the center of the canvas.


Install Zero Me and experience the convenience of a centered starting point for your Figma designs.


Created by Taryn + Claude 3 Opus
plugins.tagline: Center you Frames, Objects, Sections, and Self 🧘

plugins.name: コーディングパネル
plugins.description:
「コーディング用の数値がわかりにくい。」

「なんか色が違うと思ったらブレンドモードになってた！」

「字間の設定をよく見逃してしまう・・。」

コーディングをしていてそんな経験はありませんか？


このプラグインでは、レイヤーを選択するとコーディングで必要な数値を、タイポグラフィ、コンテンツ、エフェクトのカテゴリに分けてハイライトします。

さらに、一部コーディングの数値に自動計算したり、カラーコードのHEX値とRGB値の切替えができたり、フレームやグループ化されたレイヤーでもテキストを取得してワンクリックでコピーする機能も追加しました。


多くのデザインデータからコーディングしてきたコーダーが作った、コーダーのためのプラグインです。Figmaでコーディングするなら、ぜひ使ってみてください。


【タイポグラフィ】

テキストレイヤーに反応して、書体、太さ、文字サイズ、行間、字間、文字揃え（上下・左右）、テキスト内容を表示します。


【コンテンツ】

幅、高さ、外見透過、ブレンドモード、塗り、線の情報を表示します。


【エフェクト】

エフェクトの情報を表示します。

インナーシャドウとドロップシャドウは詳細を表示しますが、それ以外のエフェクトはエフェクト名のみ表示します。
plugins.tagline: テキストやコンテンツ、エフェクトなどのコーディングで使用する情報を分かりやすく表示します。騙されたと思って使ってみて。

🧑‍🎨 Design smarter, not harder!

Generate beautiful, customizable avatars directly in Figma with just a click – powered by DiceBear. Perfect for user profiles, mockups, wireframes, and more!

plugins.name: 10x HTML | Design to clean responsive code 10x faster
plugins.description:
⚡️ Instantly turn your Figma design into clean, responsive HTML / CSS / SCSS

🚀 No registration, no paywall, click and get your code

🔍 Preview / inspect the generated code in Figma

⚡️ Test responsiveness and make live adjustments

🎓 Smart layout and naming



Who is it for ?


  1. Beginner looking to turn a design into a website starting from a clean structure where 90% of the work is already handled


  1. Advanced front-end developers looking to drastically speed up their workflow without compromising on the structure and readability of their code.


No registration required - run the plugin, select a frame and preview the result in a single click.

Works in both Design mode and Dev mode.



What is 10x HTML ?


Most design-to-code tools generate bloated or messy output, with non optimized layout.

That’s because extracting logic from a visual design — especially an unstructured one — is a hard problem..


10x HTML was built from the ground up with the clear goal of solving those issues with smart rules and layout inference.


We focus on :

- Understanding layout intent

- Reducing unnecessary nesting

- Recognizing repeated patterns (even copy-pasted ones)

- Grouping elements intelligently

- and more...


10x HTML doesn't claim to replace a frontend developer — but it dramatically accelerates your workflow by giving you clean, factorized and structured code that you can build on.


Whether you're a beginner or an experienced front-end developer, 10xHTML is designed to handle most of the heavy lifting for you—making smart assumptions when needed and delivering perfect code with clear naming and structure that’s easy to build upon.


Clean, semantic code – without the mess

- Converts buttons, inputs, headers, and more into proper HTML elements

- Uses a smart class system: base classes, modifiers, and utilities based on context

- Picks optimized class names

- Flattens overly nested layers


Smart, responsive export

- Fully responsive by default — includes media and container queries

- Detects and links similar elements, even without components

- Intelligently groups and infers layout, even from unstructured designs


Live code and layout inspection

- Preview the final webpage right in Figma

- Test responsiveness

- Do live update to adjust the code

- Download the code and get ready for production


How to reach out ?

💬 Request support here

💡 Suggest an improvement here

🕷 Report a bug here

🚀 Join our Discord for support, feedback or questions..


⚠️ Note :

10x HTML is currently free and fully accessible as a Beta version.

We are trying to gather as much feedback as possible, so please feel free to post any kind of comments (bug report, idea, opinion...)

Once we reach the level of maturity we’re aiming for, we will switch to a paid model

(with very reasonable pricing)
plugins.tagline: Convert your design to high quality HTML / CSS / SCSS in one click and download your code.

plugins.name: Consistency Checker
plugins.description:
Consistency Checker is your all-in-one solution for ensuring your designs meet WCAG AA standards for text contrast. With a single click, check the accessibility of all text layers in a selected frame, helping you create more inclusive designs effortlessly.


Designing for accessibility shouldn't be an afterthought. Consistency Checker analyzes all text layers within a selected frame, instantly providing contrast ratio information and WCAG AA compliance status.


What This Plugin Does

  1. Evaluates text contrast ratios against backgrounds for all text layers simultaneously
  2. Shows WCAG AA pass/fail status for each text element
  3. Provides detailed contrast ratio measurements
  4. Allows quick navigation to problematic text layers with a single click
  5. Helps you identify accessibility issues early in your design process
  6. Generates comprehensive reports for documentation and team sharing


How It Works

  1. Select any frame containing text layers you want to evaluate
  2. Run Consistency Checker to instantly scan all text elements
  3. View a complete list of text layers with their contrast ratios and WCAG AA compliance status
  4. Click on any text layer in the results to jump directly to it in your design
  5. Make necessary adjustments to improve accessibility
  6. Re-scan to confirm your changes meet accessibility standards


Simplify your accessibility workflow and ensure your designs are inclusive for all users. Install Consistency Checker today!
plugins.tagline: Simplify your accessibility workflow and ensure your designs are inclusive for all users

plugins.name: dpicon - SVG Icons
plugins.description:
dpicon is a Figma plugin that provides 944 high-quality filled SVG icons for your design projects. Whether you're creating wireframes, prototypes, or polished UI designs, dpicon makes it easy to find and insert the perfect icon. Search for icons by name, double-click to place them on the canvas, or drag and drop for precise placement. With a sleek grid view and real-time search, dpicon streamlines your workflow and boosts productivity.


Key Features:

- 944 filled SVG icons, ready to use.

- Real-time search to quickly find icons.

- Double-click to place icons on the canvas.

- Lightweight and optimized for performance.


Perfect for designers looking to add professional icons to their Figma projects with ease.
plugins.tagline: Icons at Your Fingertips

plugins.name: BANCONE
plugins.description: BANCONE is a Software-as-a-Service platform powered by an integrated suite of AI-driven tools that simplify, optimize, and improve the quality of Human-Machine Interaction (HMI) design and development. Initially focused on the automotive sector, specifically software-defined vehicles, the platform is designed to expand to other industrial domains in the future. BANCONE transforms how automotive teams create and implement sophisticated cockpit interfaces, leveraging artificial intelligence to automate routine tasks, detect issues early, and generate innovative design solutions.
plugins.tagline: BANCONE is a Software-as-a-Service platform powered by an integrated suite of AI-driven tools

plugins.name: Duplication
plugins.description:
Figma Duplication Plugin

What It Does

The Figma Duplication Plugin is designed to create multiple copies of a selected frame, automatically populating text fields with data from a CSV file. Key features include:


  1. Bulk Duplication: Create multiple copies of a selected frame
  2. Dynamic Text Replacement: Update text content in each duplicate using CSV data
  3. Organized Layout: Automatically arrange duplicates in a grid layout within a new section

How To Use It

  1. Select a Frame: First, select the frame you want to duplicate in your Figma file.


  1. Launch the Plugin: Open the Duplication Plugin from your plugins panel.


Configure Settings:

  1. Enter the number of copies you want to create
  2. Select which text layers you want to modify (you can add multiple)
  3. Upload a CSV file containing the data for text replacement

CSV Format Requirements:


  1. The CSV headers must exactly match the names of the text layers you want to modify
  2. Each row represents data for one duplicate
  3. The plugin will read values from the columns corresponding to your selected text layers
  4. Click Submit: The plugin will create your duplicates in a new section with all text fields updated according to your CSV data.


Limitations

  1. Works only with frames containing text layers
  2. CSV headers must exactly match the text layer names


This plugin is ideal for creating multiple versions of components that differ only in text content, such as cards, buttons, or profile items with different data
plugins.tagline: Tired of filling in your data? just use this ! :D

127056.name: Duplication
127056.description:
Figma Duplication Plugin

plugins.name: Fig Toolkit
plugins.description:
Fig Toolkit is your all-in-one Figma companion, focused on helping designers sort, align, and organise their workspace faster and more intuitively. With powerful sorting tools, renaming capabilities, and precise alignment options, you can bring structure and clarity to any design layout. For those managing text consistency, the toolkit also scans and identifies unstyled or mixed text layers, making it easy to apply or update text styles.


🔹 Easily sort and rename layers

🔹 Precisely align elements with adjustable spacing

🔹 Wrap layers into new sections with custom padding

🔹 Reorder layers directly in the layers panel

🔹 Detect mixed or unstyled fonts

🔹 View and fix text layers missing styles

🔹 Apply or update text styles quickly

🔹 Streamline your design workflow with ease
plugins.tagline: Sort, Align & Manage Styles in Figma Effortlessly

plugins.name: Component Boss (Beta)
plugins.description:
Figma Component Boss is a powerful plugin that helps designers efficiently manage components with just a few clicks. Whether you need to convert multiple objects into a master component with linked instances or replace selected objects with an existing component, this plugin streamlines the process—saving time and maintaining consistency in your designs.


How It Works


🔹 Create Component from Selection – Select multiple objects and instantly turn them into a master component with instances, keeping styles, auto-layout, and hierarchy intact.

🔹 Link to Existing Component – Pick a target component and replace selected objects with instances of that component while preserving positions and layout.


Why Use It?


✅ Maintain proper component-instance relationships

✅ Preserve all auto-layout settings, styles, and nested structures

✅ Seamlessly convert objects into reusable instances

✅ Improve workflow efficiency and consistency


Designed for both individual designers and teams, Figma Component Master ensures your design system remains clean, organized, and scalable. Try it now and simplify your component workflow!
plugins.tagline: Supercharge Your Design Workflow

121220.name: Component Boss (Beta)
121220.description:
Figma Component Boss is a powerful plugin that helps designers efficiently manage components with just a few clicks. Whether you need to convert multiple objects into a master component with linked instances or replace selected objects with an existing component, this plugin streamlines the process—saving time and maintaining consistency in your designs.


How It Works


🔹 Create Component from Selection – Select multiple objects and instantly turn them into a master component with instances, keeping styles, auto-layout, and hierarchy intact.

🔹 Link to Existing Component – Pick a target component and replace selected objects with instances of that component while preserving positions and layout.


Why Use It?


✅ Maintain proper component-instance relationships

✅ Preserve all auto-layout settings, styles, and nested structures

✅ Seamlessly convert objects into reusable instances

✅ Improve workflow efficiency and consistency


Designed for both individual designers and teams, Figma Component Master ensures your design system remains clean, organized, and scalable. Try it now and simplify your component workflow!

plugins.name: Move Objects Frame
plugins.description:
Move Objects to Frame - オブジェクトをフレームに移動 -


このプラグインを使えば、選択したオブジェクトを指定したフレーム内に素早く移動 できます。

また、フレームに入っていないオブジェクトを検出 して、整理しやすくします。


主な機能：

✅ 選択したオブジェクトを 元の位置を維持したまま フレーム内に移動

✅ フレーム外にあるオブジェクトを検出し、通知でリストアップ

✅ 英語と日本語の両方に対応

✅ シンプルで直感的なUI


📌 使い方：

1️⃣ 1つのフレーム と フレーム内に入れたいオブジェクト を選択します。

2️⃣ 「移動する」ボタンをクリック すると、オブジェクトが位置を変えずにフレーム内へ移動します。

3️⃣ 「フレーム外を確認 🔍」をクリック すると、フレームに入っていないオブジェクトを検出し、リストで表示 します。


Move Objects to Frame を使って、作業効率をアップし、デザインを整理整頓しましょう！🎯

-----------------------------------------------

This plugin allows you to quickly move selected objects into a chosen frame while keeping their original positions.

It also detects objects that are outside any frames and helps you organize your Figma workspace more efficiently.


Features:

✅ Move multiple objects into a selected frame while preserving their positions

✅ Check if objects are outside any frames and get notified

✅ Supports both English and Japanese

✅ Simple and intuitive UI


📌 How to use:

1️⃣ Select one frame and one or more objects that you want to place inside.

2️⃣ Click the “Move it!” button, and the objects will be placed inside the frame without changing their positions.

3️⃣ To check for objects that are not inside any frames, click “Check Unframed 🔍” and get a list of unframed objects.


Boost your workflow efficiency and keep your designs well-organized with Move Objects to Frame! 🎯
plugins.tagline: Move objects into a frame while keeping their positions. Detect and list objects outside any frames.

また、フレームに入っていないオブジェクトを検出 して、整理しやすくします。

✅ 選択したオブジェクトを 元の位置を維持したまま フレーム内に移動

✅ フレーム外にあるオブジェクトを検出し、通知でリストアップ

-----------------------------------------------

plugins.name: Tailwind / Flutter Basic Setup
plugins.description:
This Plugin will generate code, styles and config options for the following things:

Tailwind:

  1. text styles (as css)
  2. font families (for tailwind.config.js)
  3. colors (for tailwind.config.js)

Flutter:

  1. Color constants
  2. TextStyles for fonts

plugins.name: CSS Custom Property to Figma
plugins.description:
1. Register CSS Color Custom Properties

• Simply copy CSS color custom properties and paste them into the input field.

• The plugin automatically parses and registers them as styles or variables.


2. Fast and Simple Conversion Flow

• Complete the flow with ease: paste your CSS code → Apply

• No complex setup required.

plugins.name: Wrighty
plugins.description:
Meet Wrighty – your go-to Figma plugin for instant, AI-powered content generation! Imagine filling all your screens with perfectly crafted text in seconds. Wrighty doesn’t just generate words; it adapts them. From landing pages to app flows, Wrighty intuitively matches your specified tone and context, creating unique, on-brand content for every screen you design.


Forget hours spent drafting and editing copy. With Wrighty, just a few clicks auto-generate clear, compelling text that resonates with your target audience. Need to rephrase content across multiple screens? No problem—Wrighty does it all, maintaining consistency and quality to let you focus on design.


Why Wrighty? It’s fast, smart, and seamless. Wrighty empowers you to scale your creative output, delivering screen-ready content that’s as polished as your visuals. Join thousands of Figma users who have already leveled up their workflow with Wrighty. Generate more, customize better, and design faster with Wrighty—the content engine that keeps up with your creativity!
plugins.tagline: AI-powered assistant for all UX writing needs.

plugins.name: Quick Fill and Hug
plugins.description:
Streamlines layout adjustments by allowing designers to quickly modify the sizing behavior of selected elements.


With simple commands, users can toggle between "Fill Container" and "Hug Contents" for both horizontal and vertical directions. This functionality saves time when working with responsive layouts, ensuring consistent spacing and alignment across designs.
plugins.tagline: Essential keyboard shortcut to fill and hug horizontal/vertically

100803.name: Quick Fill and Hug
100803.description:
Streamlines layout adjustments by allowing designers to quickly modify the sizing behavior of selected elements.


With simple commands, users can toggle between "Fill Container" and "Hug Contents" for both horizontal and vertical directions. This functionality saves time when working with responsive layouts, ensuring consistent spacing and alignment across designs.
100803.tagline: Essential keyboard shortcut to fill and hug horizontal/vertically

plugins.name: Fixiq — Fix the scale of working area
plugins.description:
Intro

In Figma, the current scale is not shown anywhere on the canvas. You can’t see how far you have moved from the actual scale of the frame. You can only select the frame and see its dimensions. And then estimate the ratio of pixels to percentages.


In Figma, you can zoom in to 100% once using hotkeys. But any movement on the board can lead to an accidental change in scale.


Solution

Fixiq not only fixes the 100% scale, but can also change it to 50%, 100%, 200%.


Plugin will be useful not only for designers, but also for managers. With Fixiq you can easily design interfaces of non-standard sizes/proportions and be sure about the scale you're working with. Your layouts will always be in the actual/original size. Managers can present project results to clients without irritating zooming.

accepted.name: Roman Nebel
accepted.description: IT Manager / UX Expert / Pet-projects Developer

plugins.tagline: Figma plugin that fixes the scale of working area
